title: AT Kupyansk Directive Russian Army Shelled Sinkivka, Ivanovka, Stepova Novoselevka of the Harkiv region. Russians Aviation Street ...
content: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Synkivka, Ivanivka, Stepova Novoselivka of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Makiyivka of Luhansk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
